channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical Ltd. -- Anbox Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical Ltd. -- Anbox Cloud

item.title: CVE-2024-8287|2024-09-18T18:52:28.961Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- anbox%20cloud
item.description: Anbox Management Service, in versions 1.17.0 through 1.23.0, does not validate the TLS certificate provided to it by the Anbox Stream Agent. An attacker must be able to machine-in-the-middle the Anbox Stream Agent from within an internal network before they can attempt to take advantage of this.
